title: How to Make a Coconut Milkshake

steps.headline: Prepare your work area.
steps.description: You can do this by measuring all your ingredients out and having the blender and other supplies out and ready. Then add the coconut ice cream to your blender.

steps.headline: Blend the ice cream slowly, until it is smooth.
steps.description: It should be at the consistency of a thin soup and relatively easy to stir.

steps.headline: Put the drink into a cup or tall glass.
Use a teaspoon to slowly shake the coconut flakes on top of the drink.
Add a straw to complete the drink.
Plug in a blender and clean your work area.
steps.description: Ensure that it is not wet.

steps.headline: Blend all of the ingredients except the vanilla extract.
Sprinkle on the vanilla extract and blend again.
steps.description: Stop when the vanilla extract is part of the milkshake.

steps.headline: Add a straw if needed.
steps.description: You can also add some ice to keep it cool.

steps.headline: Enjoy on a hot summers day!

text: Making a Basic Coconut Milkshake Prepare your work area. You can do this by measuring all your ingredients out and having the blender and other supplies out and ready. Then add the coconut ice cream to your blender. Blend the ice cream slowly, until it is smooth. It should be at the consistency of a thin soup and relatively easy to stir. Add the milk and sugar. Blend until all are smooth. Put the drink into a cup or tall glass.  Use a teaspoon to slowly shake the coconut flakes on top of the drink.  Add a straw to complete the drink. Enjoy on a hot day! Making a Chocolate Coconut Milkshake Plug in a blender and clean your work area. Ensure that it is not wet. Blend all of the ingredients except the vanilla extract. Stop blending when smooth. Sprinkle on the vanilla extract and blend again. Stop when the vanilla extract is part of the milkshake. Add a straw if needed. You can also add some ice to keep it cool. Enjoy on a hot summers day! Keep cool at all times.
